document.full_text: much of the united states was expected to bask in warm, humid, summer-like weather on sunday as the country, raked by deadly storms over the past month, marks the second day of the long memorial day weekend with some welcome quiet on the meteorological front.
document.title: in most of u.s., memorial day weekend weather points to summer
lines_and_colors: much of the united states was expected to bask in warm, humid, summer-like weather on sunday as the country, raked by deadly storms over the past month, marks the second day of the long memorial day weekend with some welcome quiet on the meteorological front.
